issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Add option to write compressed CSV
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15148](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15148). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
From ARROW-15060.
